name: Malakbel
description: Malakbel is a Medium-sized Fiend known for its Chaotic Evil nature, characterized by a fiery presence and radiant light that inflicts damage to nearby foes.
memorable: Notably, it can illuminate the battlefield with Blistering Radiance while inflicting both radiant and fire damage.
goals: Malakbel seeks to dominate opponents and inflict pain through its devastating radiant powers.
relations: It may serve other powerful fiends or be encountered with other chaotic evil creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic realms or locations infused with magic.
strengths: Malakbel has high Dexterity and Charisma, giving it agility and spellcasting prowess. It is immune to fire and radiant damage.
weaknesses: Susceptible to cold and lightning damage and can be harmed by nonmagical attacks.
attacks: Malakbel can launch two Scorching Blast attacks each turn, dealing significant fire damage and has a deadly Searing Flare special attack.
most_powerful_ability: Blistering Radiance lights up the battlefield and deals consistent radiant damage to nearby foes.
senses: Malakbel has truesight up to 30 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and darkness.
skills: It possesses keen perception abilities with a passive Perception score of 17.
additional_information: Radiant damage can dispel lower-level darkness spells.
Ranged attacks against Malakbel are made at a disadvantage.
It has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Malakbel teleports up to 100 feet, making it a difficult target.
Can inflict exhaustion on foes caught in its Searing Flare attack.

powerful monster that deals fire damage
medium fiend that radiates bright light
monster with truesight and teleport ability
fiend known for scorching blast attacks
